actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Michael Treble Lysenko and Beverly Carol Dancho.

summary.text: Declares a named individual to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act. Provides that a named individual who lost United States citizenship may be naturalized and regain the same citizenship status as that which existed immediately prior to its loss.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Michael Treble Lysenko and Beverly Carol Dancho.
